item.title: TSM Invalid file handle passed
item.description: If TSM client job failed with and error of “Invalid file handle passed”. Here is a quick solution. Stop the TSM Client Scheduler service. net stop "TSM Client Scheduler" Delete (or rename) the adsm.sys directory. The directory will be recreated by TSM. Restart the TSM Client Scheduler service. net start "TSM Client Scheduler" Rerun the backup job.
